```{r outtabfcmef, cache=cacheon}
survfunc <- function(time, event, eventname, rep = FALSE) {
  out <- data.frame(matrix(NA, ncol = 9, nrow = 11))

  out[1, 1] <- eventname
  colnames(out) <- c("Outcome", "EF", "Model", rep(levels(pdata$shf_ferrocarboxymaltosis), 2), "p int crude", "p int adj match")

  levef <- levels(pdata$shf_ef_cat)

  for (i in seq_along(levef)) {
    out[3 * i, 2] <- levef[i]

    # incidence rate
    out[3 * i, 3] <- "Incidence"

    ## unmatched
    if (!rep) {
      ev <- pdata_fcm %>%
        filter(shf_ef_cat == levef[i]) %>%
        group_by(shf_ferrocarboxymaltosis) %>%
        summarise(
          ev = sum(!!sym(event) == "Yes"),
          .groups = "rowwise"
        )
    }
    if (rep) {
      ev <- pdata_fcm %>%
        filter(shf_ef_cat == levef[i]) %>%
        group_by(shf_ferrocarboxymaltosis) %>%
        summarise(
          ev = sum(!!sym(event)),
          .groups = "rowwise"
        )
    }

    s <- pdata_fcm %>%
      filter(shf_ef_cat == levef[i]) %>%
      group_by(shf_ferrocarboxymaltosis) %>%
      summarise(
        s = sum(!!sym(time) / 365.25),
        .groups = "rowwise"
      )
    r <- pois.exact(x = ev$ev, pt = s$s / 1000)

    out[3 * i, 4:5] <- paste0(
      ev$ev, ", ",
      dF(s$s, dig = 0), ", ",
      dF(r$rate, dig = 0), " (",
      dF(r$lower, dig = 0), "-",
      dF(r$upper, dig = 0), ")"
    )

    ## matched
    if (!rep) {
      ev <- matchp_fcm %>%
        filter(shf_ef_cat == levef[i]) %>%
        group_by(shf_ferrocarboxymaltosis) %>%
        summarise(
          ev = sum(!!sym(event) == "Yes"),
          .groups = "rowwise"
        )
    }
    if (rep) {
      ev <- matchp_fcm %>%
        filter(shf_ef_cat == levef[i]) %>%
        group_by(shf_ferrocarboxymaltosis) %>%
        summarise(
          ev = sum(!!sym(event)),
          .groups = "rowwise"
        )
    }

    s <- matchp_fcm %>%
      filter(shf_ef_cat == levef[i]) %>%
      group_by(shf_ferrocarboxymaltosis) %>%
      summarise(
        s = sum(!!sym(time) / 365.25),
        .groups = "rowwise"
      )
    r <- pois.exact(x = ev$ev, pt = s$s / 1000)

    out[3 * i, 6:7] <- paste0(
      ev$ev, ", ",
      dF(s$s, dig = 0), ", ",
      dF(r$rate, dig = 0), " (",
      dF(r$lower, dig = 0), "-",
      dF(r$upper, dig = 0), ")"
    )

    if (!rep) {
      # cox regressions
      ## crude
      mod <- coxph(formula(paste0("Surv(", time, ",", event, "=='Yes') ~ shf_ferrocarboxymaltosis * relevel(shf_ef_cat, ref = '", levef[i], "')")),
        data = pdata_fcm
      )
      smod <- summary(mod)
      out[4 * i, 3] <- "Crude HR (95% CI), p-value"
      out[4 * i, 4:5] <- c("ref", paste0(
        dF(smod$conf.int[1, 1], dig = 2),
        " (", dF(smod$conf.int[1, 3], dig = 2),
        "-", dF(smod$conf.int[1, 4], dig = 2), "), ",
        dF(smod$coef[1, 5], dig = 3, p = TRUE)
      ))

      if (i == 1) {
        pint <- car::Anova(mod, type = "III", test.statistic = "Wald")

        out[1, 8] <- dF(last(pint$`Pr(>Chisq)`), dig = 3, p = TRUE)
      }

      ## adjusted individual covariates
      amod <- with(imp, coxph(formula(paste0(
        "Surv(", time, ",", event, " == 'Yes') ~ shf_ferrocarboxymaltosis * relevel(shf_ef_cat, ref = '", levef[i], "') +",
        paste(modvars, collapse = " + ")
      ))))

      ## df the number of events minus the regression coefficients.
      ## There is support for this from middle of page 149 of the book by Parmer & Machin (ISBN 0471936405)
      asmod <- summary(pool(amod,
        dfcom =
          (amod$analyses[[1]]$nevent - length(amod$analyses[[1]]$coefficients))
      ))

      out[5 * i, 3] <- "Adjusted HR (95% CI), p-value"
      out[5 * i, 4:5] <- c("ref", paste0(
        dF(exp(asmod$estimate[1]), dig = 2),
        " (", dF(exp(asmod$estimate[1] - global_z05 * asmod$std.error[1]), dig = 2),
        "-", dF(exp(asmod$estimate[1] + global_z05 * asmod$std.error[1]), dig = 2), "), ",
        dF(asmod$p.value[1:3], dig = 3, p = TRUE)
      ))

      ## adjusted matched
      mod <- coxph(formula(paste0("Surv(", time, ",", event, "=='Yes') ~ shf_ferrocarboxymaltosis  * relevel(shf_ef_cat, ref = '", levef[i], "') + strata(par)")),
        data = matchp_fcm
      )
      smod <- summary(mod)
      out[5 * i, 6:7] <- c("ref", paste0(
        dF(smod$conf.int[1, 1], dig = 2),
        " (", dF(smod$conf.int[1, 3], dig = 2),
        "-", dF(smod$conf.int[1, 4], dig = 2), "), ",
        dF(smod$coef[1, 5], dig = 3, p = TRUE)
      ))

      if (i == 1) {
        pint <- car::Anova(mod, type = "III", test.statistic = "Wald")

        out[1, 9] <- dF(last(pint$`Pr(>Chisq)`), dig = 3, p = TRUE)
      }
    }

    if (rep) {
      # neg binomial regression
      ## crude
      mod <- glm.nb(formula(paste0(event, " ~ shf_ferrocarboxymaltosis * relevel(shf_ef_cat, ref = '", levef[i], "') + offset(log(", time, "))")),
        data = pdata_fcm
      )

      smod <- summary(mod)
      out[4 * i, 3] <- "Crude IRR (95% CI), p-value"
      out[4 * i, 4:5] <- c("ref", paste0(
        dF(exp(smod$coefficients[2, 1]), dig = 2),
        " (", dF(exp(smod$coefficients[2, 1] - global_z05 * smod$coefficients[2, 2]), dig = 2),
        "-", dF(exp(smod$coefficients[2, 1] + global_z05 * smod$coefficients[2, 2]), dig = 2), "), ",
        dF(smod$coefficients[2, 4], dig = 3, p = TRUE)
      ))

      if (i == 1) {
        pint <- car::Anova(mod, type = "III", test.statistic = "Wald")

        out[1, 8] <- dF(last(pint$`Pr(>Chisq)`), dig = 3, p = TRUE)
      }

      ## adjusted individual covariates
      imp_fcm <- subset_datlist(imp, subset = c(pdata$shf_id == "Yes" | pdata$shf_ferrocarboxymaltosis == "Yes"))
      amod <- with(imp_fcm, glm.nb(formula(paste0(
        event, " ~ shf_ferrocarboxymaltosis * relevel(shf_ef_cat, ref = '", levef[i], "') + offset(log(", time, ")) +",
        paste(modvars[modvars != "shf_ef_cat"], collapse = " + ")
      ))))

      asmod <- summary(pool(amod))

      out[5 * i, 3] <- "Adjusted IRR (95% CI), p-value"
      out[5 * i, 4:5] <- c("ref", paste0(
        dF(exp(asmod$estimate[2]), dig = 2),
        " (", dF(exp(asmod$estimate[2] - global_z05 * asmod$std.error[2]), dig = 2),
        "-", dF(exp(asmod$estimate[2] + global_z05 * asmod$std.error[2]), dig = 2), "), ",
        dF(asmod$p.value[2], dig = 3, p = TRUE)
      ))

      ## adjusted matched
      mod <- glm.nb(formula(paste0(event, " ~ shf_ferrocarboxymaltosis * relevel(shf_ef_cat, ref = '", levef[i], "') + offset(log(", time, "))")),
        data = matchp_fcm
      )
      smod <- summary(mod)

      out[5 * i, 6:7] <- c("ref", paste0(
        dF(exp(smod$coefficients[2, 1]), dig = 2),
        " (", dF(exp(smod$coefficients[2, 1] - global_z05 * smod$coefficients[2, 2]), dig = 2),
        "-", dF(exp(smod$coefficients[2, 1] + global_z05 * smod$coefficients[2, 2]), dig = 2), "), ",
        dF(smod$coefficients[2, 4], dig = 3, p = TRUE)
      ))

      if (i == 1) {
        pint <- car::Anova(mod, type = "III", test.statistic = "Wald")

        out[1, 9] <- dF(last(pint$`Pr(>Chisq)`), dig = 3, p = TRUE)
      }
    }
  }
  return(out)
}

deathhfhosp <- survfunc(
  time = "sos_outtime_hosphf",
  event = "sos_out_deathhosphf",
  eventname = "All-cause death/first HF hospitalization"
)
death <- survfunc(
  time = "sos_outtime_death",
  event = "sos_out_death",
  eventname = "All-cause death"
)
hfhosp <- survfunc(
  time = "sos_outtime_hosphf",
  event = "sos_out_hosphf",
  eventname = "First HF hospitalization"
)
hfhosprep <- survfunc(
  time = "sos_outtime_death",
  event = "sos_out_nohosphf",
  eventname = "HF hospitalization",
  rep = TRUE
)
anyhosp <- survfunc(
  time = "sos_outtime_hospany",
  event = "sos_out_hospany",
  eventname = "First all-cause hospitalization"
)
anyhosprep <- survfunc(
  time = "sos_outtime_death",
  event = "sos_out_nohospany",
  eventname = "All-cause hospitalization",
  rep = TRUE
)
hfvis <- survfunc(
  time = "sos_outtime_vishf",
  event = "sos_out_vishf",
  eventname = "First HF visit"
)
hfvisrep <- survfunc(
  time = "sos_outtime_death",
  event = "sos_out_novishf",
  eventname = "HF visit",
  rep = TRUE
)


outall <- bind_rows(
  deathhfhosp,
  death,
  hfhosp,
  hfhosprep,
  anyhosp,
  anyhosprep,
  hfvis,
  hfvisrep
)

colnames(outall) <- c("Outcome", "EF", "Model", rep(levels(pdata$shf_ferrocarboxymaltosis), 2), "p int crude", "p int adj match")

write.xlsx(outall, paste0("./output/tabs/out_ef_fcm_", Sys.Date(), ".xlsx"), rowNames = FALSE)

myHeader <- c(" " = 1, " " = 1, " " = 1, "All" = 2, "Matched" = 2, " " = 1, " " = 1)
names(myHeader) <- c(" ", " ", " ", "All", "Matched", " ", " ")

footnote(mykable(outall,
  fontsize = 4.5,
  caption = "Outcomes FCM by EF",
  longtable = TRUE
) %>%
  landscape() %>%
  add_header_above(myHeader),
general = c(
  "Incidence =  no events, sum py, rate/1000py (95% CI)."
)
)
```
